name: Circles Puzzle Game
description:
This is a novel three-matched game, as long as the formation of a line of three or more than three rings will be eliminated, the gameplay is simple and easy to use.

Challenge the higher score!

How to play：

Arrange the rings of the same color into a straight line to destroy them.

The higher the score, the better.

The game ends when the circle cannot be placed on the screen.

You can use the props to replace the current circle.

Have fun, good luck！
